title: Drawing, Design for Semi-Circular Writing Table with Brass Railing, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Semi-Circular Writing Table with Brass Railing
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right corner of sheet: Writing Table. / of Mahogany
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Semi-circular table top with brass railing at back; raised on 4 fluted columnar legs terminating in slim tapering feet with flute stops; center drawer carved in floral motifs and flanked by 4 shallow drawers with round knob pulls; atop table: ink well, sand container, envelopes, etc.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Semi-Circular Writing Table with Brass Railing, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-242
